N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.6 - Application content

State Regulations

On and after February 14, 2010, a lender, or its servicer, or the corporation acting on behalf of the eligible lender, shall clearly and
conspicuously disclose on, or with, any application or solicitation for a
program loan, as part of the lender's compliance with section
2213.5
(h) of this

Part, all of the applicable disclosure requirements contained in the Federal

Truth in Lending Act (Regulation Z) as set forth in 12 CFR part
226, subpart F. Lenders must also comply with all other requirements required by applicable New

York State and Federal law and regulation (as well as any applicable law and
regulation in the state in which the lender is located). Notes
